title: Genesis Chapter 2 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 2 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

options: Called upon the name of the Lord

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 2:8?
questions.explanation: Genesis 2:8 states: "And the LORD God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed."

questions.question: Where did the events of Genesis 2:10 take place?
questions.explanation: Genesis 2:10 states: "And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 2:15?
questions.explanation: Genesis 2:15 states: "And the LORD God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 2:1: "______ the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 2:2: "And on the ______ day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the ______ day from all his work which he had made."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 2:6: "But there went up a ______ from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "But there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground."
